name: Green Design
description:
- Changed the main theme colour from blue to green.
- Changed the header background image to suit the green.
- Added a larger curve to forum headers.
- Added a larger curve to posts.
- Added a larger curve to buttons.
- Made avatars square to see the whole thing.
- Hovering over your private message icon will change it's colour.
- Simplified server list design.
- Scaled all signatures down to a maximum height of 300px.
- Automatically centered all signatures.
- Recoloured several buttons and icons on the theme to match the green.
- Resized and recoloured the user drop down panel.

Using Switcheroo;
- Changed the forum logo images.
- Changed the footer logo image.
- Changed the server lists images.
- Changed the rep button images.
additional_info:
For best results with this theme I recommend installing the Switcheroo plugin to Google Chrome.
Then add the following replacements to Switcheroo.
